name: Bench Press
description: A compound exercise targeting the chest, triceps, and shoulders. Perform lying on a bench, pressing a barbell or dumbbells from chest level up to arms' length.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
description: Targets the upper chest and shoulders, performed on an incline bench with dumbbells pressed from shoulder height to arms' length.

name: Push-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders, performed in a plank position while lowering and raising the body.

name: Overhead Press
description: A shoulder exercise performed standing or seated, pressing a barbell or dumbbells overhead, which also engages the triceps.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
description: Isolates the side deltoids, performed by raising dumbbells to the side while keeping arms slightly bent.

name: Barbell Curl
description: An isolation exercise targeting the biceps, performed by curling a barbell from hip level to shoulder level while keeping the elbows stationary.

name: Hammer Curl
description: Targets the biceps and brachialis, performed by curling dumbbells with a neutral grip from hip to shoulder level.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A back exercise performed on a cable machine, pulling a bar from overhead down to the chest, engaging the lats and biceps.

name: Pull-Up
description: A bodyweight exercise targeting the lats, biceps, and upper back, performed by pulling oneself up to a bar.

name: Deadlift
description: A compound lift targeting the back, glutes, and hamstrings. Perform by lifting a barbell from the ground up to standing.

name: Squat
description: A compound exercise targeting the quads, glutes, and hamstrings, performed by lowering the hips from a standing position and then standing back up.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based exercise that primarily targets the quads, with secondary activation in the glutes and hamstrings.

name: Lunges
description: A unilateral leg exercise targeting the quads, glutes, and hamstrings, performed by stepping forward or backward into a lunge position.

name: Leg Curl
description: An isolation exercise targeting the hamstrings, performed on a machine where the heels are brought toward the glutes.

name: Calf Raise
description: A lower leg exercise focusing on the calves, performed by raising the heels from the ground while standing or seated.
